EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Big Data Roadshow_Q117.Confirmation - Seoul
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow in Seoul. Please see event details below.
Date & Time: Wednesday, 5 April 2017, 09.50 - 16.10 Location: Gold Hall , B1, Eltower, Seoul, Korea address: 24 Yangjae-dong, Seocho-gu, Seoul (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/%EC%97%98%ED%83%80%EC%9B%8C/@37.482407,127.033217,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x357ca14a2f3174ed:0xe23759b8774ffc69!8m2!3d37.482407!4d127.035411]]>)
Questions? Please email Woorim Lee at wrlee@pivotal.io. <[[mailto:wrlee@pivotal.io]]>
